alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Florida A And M, or near Tallahassee, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Scotland, Eight Mile Pond, Killearn Estates, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex and Governors Square Mall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
